cause.description:
Every year in eastern Canada , inhumane people hold a seal hunt for the slaughter of innocent animals ...nothing has been done to stop this hunt & i think it's time that the Canadian goverment steps in & does the right thing.....LETS DO OUR PART!!!
1. Canada's seal hunt must end immediately!!
cause.mission: Raise awareness about the slaughter of innocent seal's every year!!!
cause.name: Stop Canada's Seal Hunt
